sentences.en: He demonstrated his mastery of political manoeuvring.
sentences.cn: 他表现出了高超的政治手段。

sentences.en: He doesn't have mastery of the basic rules of grammar.
sentences.cn: 他没有掌握基本的语法规则。

sentences.en: He has a good grasp [ mastery ] of English grammar.
sentences.cn: 他英语语法学得很扎实.

sentences.en: He has acquired mastery of French.
He shows complete mastery of his chosen subject.
sentences.cn: 他精通自己选择的那门科目.

sentences.en: His mastery is'evident only in flashes '.
sentences.cn: 他的技巧 “ 只闪现在刹那之间. ”

sentences.en: His mastery of the French language was proverbial.
sentences.cn: 他对法语的精通是众所周知的。

sentences.en: Mesopotamia was probably the first region of the world where humans gained mastery over major rivers.
sentences.cn: 美索不达米亚地区可能是世界上人类最早征服主干河流的地区。

sentences.en: Never before had Rudolf played with such mastery.
sentences.cn: 鲁道夫从未演奏得这么炉火纯青.
只有实践才能达到精通.

sentences.en: She appealed to his mastery for help in solving her problem.
sentences.cn: 她请求他运用他的知识去解决她的问题.

sentences.en: She has mastery of several languages.
The team gained mastery over its opponent.
To cross the threshold is not difficult, but mastery is another question.
sentences.cn: 入门不难, 深造不易.

sentences.en: To gain a complete mastery of English, one must study very hard.
sentences.cn: 要想精通英语就必须刻苦努力.

words.tran_cn: 掌握；精通；优势；征服；统治权

phrases.tran_cn: 掌握学习；通达学习；精熟学习

trans.tran_cn: 精通，熟练，统治，控制，优势
